name: The Maze (itch) (Phaze)
description:
Servers are now online!!!

Race your friends to the exit of a maze, but with a twist... You can trade places with a random person every 5 seconds!

When you click play in browser it should popout to the game website, if not click here

Controls
  • To move around on pc use WASD
  • To move around on mobile / tablet you can click and drag on the screen
  • Press T or the button in the bottom right to trade places (if there is a time on it thats the cooldown)
Known Bugs
  • Sometimes the exit will spawn in places it is not supposed to be making the maze impossible
  • Cloudflare sometimes times out the websocket connection if no data is sent across it
  • Sometimes players don't leave servers properly, resulting in "ghost players"
  • The collision system needs work
Credits
  • Programming: Phaze
  • Sprites: Misty
  • Playtesters: Kashieru, EMRALDSCOUT_C
  • UI Sprites: This OpenGameArt Page

Should support mobile / tablets as well as pc!

Donations: https://ko-fi.com/phazedev
